msgSnippet: I d like to see some examples of how to use the API. I had a look at all the references I have found on your website but could not find any sample code.

I'd like to see some examples of how to use the API.
I had a look at all the references I have found on your website but 
could not find any sample code.

Frank-Michael


Vladimir R. Bossicard wrote:
> *** please do not reply to this email ***
> 
>          ========================
>              JUNIT-ADDONS 1.4
>          ========================
> 
> I'm happy to announce the 1.4 release of JUnit-addons.
> <http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=60272>
> 
> This version contains several new classes (ListAssert, StringAssert,
> NamingAssert) and new methods for the StringAssert class.  Particularly
> useful is the new method 'include(String classpath)' of the TestFilter
> class: a class now doesn't need to be loaded to be excluded from a
> Directory- or ArchiveSuiteBuilder.  See the change log :
>     <http://sourceforge.net/project/shownotes.php?release_id=148204>
> 
> You can find further information at <http://junit-addons.sf.net>
> 
> Thank you for using JUnit-addons
> 
> -Vladimir
>
subject: Re: [Announce] JUnit-addons 1.4 released
